Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the risk faced by Mr. Acosta was generalized or personalized
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 97
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Gang targeted Mr. Acosta for not paying extortion; gangs commonly target bus fare collectors
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to demonstrate particularized risk
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Board found evidence insufficient to establish personalized risk
Crimes.Legal_Rule: A person in need of protection must face a specific, non-generalized risk of harm
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Analysis of whether the Board erred in its assessment
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Risk of harm from gang violence upon return to Honduras
Crimes.Outcome_on_Merits: Claim rejected due to generalized nature of risk
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Targeting of bus fare collectors by gangs in Honduras
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Board wrongly classified risk as generalized
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Not applicable – administrative decision under review
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of Board's negative determination
Crimes.Remedy_Sought: Overturn Board's decision and grant protected person status
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board, Federal Court
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Failing to meet definition of 'person in need of protection'
Crimes.Applicable_Process: Refugee protection determination and judicial review

Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Involved: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 97
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Threats and violence from gang in Honduras after coworker was killed
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Grant of refugee protection and stay in Canada
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Demonstration of particularized risk distinct from general population
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board, Federal Court
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Personal testimony, country reports on gang violence
Crimes.Personal_Data_Implicated: Identity, employment as bus fare collector, threats received
Crimes.Complaint_Issues: Denial of refugee protection based on risk characterization
Crimes.Protected_Group: Not formally claimed under group persecution
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Person in need of protection under IRPA
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Fear of gang-related violence upon return
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Honduran state unable or unwilling to protect
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Association with job targeted by gangs (bus fare collector)
Crimes.Credibility: Generally accepted, but risk deemed generalized
Crimes.State_Protection_Adequacy: Found inadequate, but risk still generalized
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national claiming need for protection
Crimes.Legal_Basis: IRPA s. 97 – person in need of protection
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Extortion demand and threat due to occupation
